current.cookie-text: To deliver exceptional quality and service we use Cookies, pixel tracking and anonymized site tracking such a Google Analytics. You can always disable and erase cookies as well as request to review, amen or delete your data.

settings.newsletter_subheading: Promotions, new products and sales. Directly to your inbox.

settings.heading: WOW!
settings.quote: "I am so happy with this beautiful and unique piece of art. Amazing quality and great service. I really do recommend Dogmade artwork."
settings.author: Emelie P

settings.heading: Way above expectations!
settings.quote: "The print looks even better in reality. Great experience from start to finish!"
settings.author: Anna R

settings.heading: I LOVE the hand-painted feel!
settings.quote: "It really feels like a painting and not a poster. It looks so amazing in my living room!"
settings.author: Ida R

settings.newsletter_form_subheading: Sign up and we'll let you know when we open!

settings.text: With Dogmade, you can get a customized work of art for your four-legged soul mate.

settings.heading: Know someone with a four-legged soul mate?
settings.text: Then a Dogmade gift card is the perfect present!

settings.announcement-text: Can’t find your dog breed? Let us know!

settings.title: 310 Gram Copperplate Paper
settings.text: We are proud to be using the heavyweight Hahnemühle German Etching, which is nothing but the crème-de-la-crème of fine art paper. Characterized by its refined structure and a matt, warm white shade, it looks great in all types of light. Guaranteed to last over 40 years, it is free of acid and lignin.

settings.title: About
settings.text: Ever since the first cave paintings, dogs have been praised and portrayed as living symbols of protection, loyalty and unconditional love. Our goal is to keep this tradition alive by letting dog lovers immortalize their furry friends in a modern and personalized way.

settings.summary-item-text: Select your dog breed from over 60 breeds.
Choose style, color and size. If you like, you can also add your dog's name.
Review and place your order. We offer free shipping worldwide!
